pages.text: The $(mob)Weresheep$() is a helper that can be spawned from the $(thing)Weresheep Egg$(). It flees when attacked, but can trade various items in exchange for $(item)Weresheep Tokens$(), similar to a $(l:minecraft_villager)$(mob)Villager$().
$(mob)Weresheeps$() can drop a $(item)Weresheep Egg$() on death. This item can be used to spawn a passive $(mob)Weresheep$() helper for the player.

$(mob)Weresheep$() can be dyed different colors and sheared for $(item)Wool$() of their corresponding color, similar to $(l:minecraft_sheep)$(mob)Sheep$(). However, $(mob)Weresheep$() sheared do not regrow their wool.
